Class Window

java.lang.Object
Window
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class Window
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
Contains the main system loop for the Story Engine reading and playing.
Author:
Prokop Svaƒçina
